1.content: You receive a letter to a wonderful new puzzle maze with a wonderful prize for whoever completed it. So what gender are you?
1.title: Getting Started

11.content:
West Richman- Age-16 A nerdy genius, who already graduated highschool and enjoys a challenge in life. He thinks he is better than ever one else



Adam Keys- Age 18- A high school graduated, who has been the bully at his high school for years. Adam has yet has figured out what he wants to do in his life



Remy Fury- Age 23- A business man, who just got fired in his job for going to work drunk.
11.title: Male Competitor

111.content:
You arrived at the location on the letter you received. You looked at the small building in between two large buildings. Labyrinth of New Beginnings, you stared at the sign. You walked over to the red door. You toke a deep breath before you open the door and enter the white room. You are blinded by the white light.

When your eyes finally adjusted to the light. You realized you are in what looks like an giant maze, The walls of the maze were too high to climb over. You walk over to the one of the walls of the labyrinth. You looked at the childish wallpaper on wall. You suddenly had a bad feeling, about this place. You turned to left. You looked and noticed the door disappeared and a wall replaced it.

You realize that you have to finish the maze to get out this strange place. You started to walk. You run into your first set of choices in the maze....

Lola Newport- Age-16 A hot cheerleader, who bullies everyone in her high school.

Whitney Silver- Age 21- A senior college student on her way of getting a degree in Teaching. She has a child like happiness to her

Sally Mayweather- Age 25- A hot shot policewoman. She was a former stripper. She is ready to start a new chapter in her life.

121.title: Lola's first steps

1211.content:
'I hope this is worth it.' Lola thought to herself. 'This place has legends talking about people coming here and having everything they ever wanted' she thought to herself, fanitasing about being a princess or a model after she gets through this labyrinth.

'Hello' a voice inside her head said.

Lola stops in her tracks and looks around. "Who said that?" She asks, with a little fear in her voice.

'I just want to warn you that you have it wrong, we don't give everything somebody wanted, we do want whatever we want with anybody.' The same voice said.

"Alright come out, I warn ya... I... I have been beating up plenary of guys and I'm not one to be taken care of easily." She said, referring to all the weak nerds she beat up at school.

'Ok, I'll come out' the voice said.

And then out came a...
1211.title: left

choices: Give in and play a game with Pixie the Fairy
Shut Pixie up and Slap her
12111.content:
A pretty pink fairy flew over to Lola. "Hello Miss. I am Pixie the Fairy. You want to play a game with me." said the Fairy. The Fairy flew around her.

"I don't have time to play any games." said Lola. Lola started to walk but was stopped by the fairy.

"Come on, Play a game with me. I will make it worth wild for you." said Pixie. "I want you to play a game with you. I have not had a plaything in a while." said Pixie

"I am not a plaything you stupid fairy." said Lola. She started to get angry at the fairy.

"Last chance, you want to play a game with me?" asked Pixie the Fairy.
12111.title: Pixie the Fairy

choices: The Fairies force Lola to use her diaper and not change her for awhile.
They do something else to her.
121112.content:
"NO NOW SHUT UP!!!" Lola yells as she slaps the fairy, throwing her to the ground.

"Ow..." Pixie wined, I would describe her state but it would break a rule if I said anything about it.

"PIXIE" a bigger (by one inch) blue fairy yells as she flies over to the pink fairy. "I felt your energy, come on." She said hugging the pink fairy, who then shot up, healed over all pain.

"Mama?" Pixie said.

"What happened?" The mother fairy asks.

"That big meanie person hit me, only because I wanted to play with her." Pixie said, pointing to Lola.

"Don't worry let Mama Nippi handle this." The blue fairy tells her, as she files up Lola face.

"Alright human what did you do to my baby!" Nippi said, filled with motherly rage.

"Well she kept bothering me, asking me to play, so I shut her up by slapping her, I didn't think it would hurt her that much." Lola said, slightly annoyed this is still taking up her time.

"You may not be able to tell but she's a child, they are like this, now apologize to her." Nippi tells Lola.

"No now leave me alone." Lola tells the blue fairy.

"Didn't you see how much pain you put her in, apologize or You will be punished." Nippi warns her, pulling out a wand.

Lola was getting really annoyed. 'Cant she see I don't care.' She thought to herself. She forms a fist and grits her teeth. "NO I DON'T CARE ABOUT YOU" she yells, throwing a punch towards Nippi.

Nippi waves her wand and has it connect to Lola's fist. Lola's fist stops, then starts to sparkle, then her whole body starts to sparkle. "You should have listened." Nippi says as Lola eyes get heavy and she falls unconscious.

Lola wakes up to find herself on a woodern floor, she looks up to see Nippi, Pixei and a large audience of fairys around her.

"She's awake." One fairy says.

"HUMAN!" A loud voice says behind her. She looks over to see a fairy bigger then herself (about 8 feet tall)in a white dress looking down at her . "You are charged with attempted murder twice, is this true?" The white fairy women asks.

Unsure of what to say, she figures she has no way to win so she answers truthfully. "I guess, I mean-" she begins.

"Thank you for making this quick, YOU ARE GULTY!" The large fairy yells, causing the crowd of fairies to cheer. "Order, I sentence you to serve as our plaything until we see fit." She order as she flys over to her.

Lola then starts to sparkle and float in mid air again. Her clothes then disappear.

Pixie and Nippi then fly to the white fairy. "Great Light Fairy, can I punish her first, can I, can I please?" The pink fairy asks in a childish demeanor.

"I do suppose you two should get first shots at her because of what she did to you, fine you may both spank her." The Great Light Fairy said.

"YAY!" Pixie screams in joy as she and her mom fly towards Lola butt.

Lola was getting scared so she tries to move only to struggle to have any control of her body. She looks I front of her to see the white fairy.

"Now now, playthings move only as their mistresses want then too..." She said holding a rod in a pacifier in the other. She then jams the Pacifier in Lola's mouth. "And babies have no say in anything." The Great White Fairy said with a big smile.

Pixei and Nippi were at your butt, Pixie help up her wand and it transforms into a spanking paddle fit for Lola's size. Pixie holds it up... Only to have it make the first hit because she has trouble lifting it. Nippi then takes hold of Pixie and helps lifts the paddle. They get into ready position.

"Now I want you to deliver 50 spanks to her, I won't count that accental one. Now... GO!" White Fairy demanded.

The spanking was a great time for the faires, they all love Lola's torture and cheer on Nippi and Pixei. Lola was crying by the 10th hit and hated every second of the torture.

"Alright that's enough." The Great Whitie Fairy said. "You two are dismissed. Now lets prepare the baby for her uniform." She orders, as Nippi and Pixie leave. The Great White Fairy spreads baby powder all over Lola's vagina and her butt. Then a bunch of faires bring a pink dispose able diaper with butterfly's on it to Lola

After Lola is put into her diaper, The Great White Fairy asks. "So what we do with her fairy?" She asks, with an exited voice.

Lola knew things were not going to be getting better for her anytime soon.
121112.title: Mess with faires and become their playthings.

choices: Go back  and use the training potty
1212.content: You decided turn right. You soon spotted a training potty. You look at the training potty. You pass by it without a second thought. You continued to walk through the labyrinth. You felt your bladders start to hurt as you realized you need to pee.
1212.title: right

12123.content:
Ugh, come on, there has to be a bathroom somewhere! Or a pot, or something!" Lola yelps, as she ran down the hallway, finding anything to use that would let her pee out. "Anything beats that baby toilet back there. Ohhhhhhh" she said as she was about to burst. "No, come on, come-" but it was too late as she starts to leak yellow urine from her legs, feeling ashamed of herself.

"Well look what we have here." A voice she knew behind her said.

"M-mom! What are you doing here." Lola said, surprised. She came here alone and she did tell some people what's she's going to do, but she didn't say where it was.

Her motherl was a tall woman, about 6 feet, Lola doesn't remember her being this tall but then again she doesn't remember most details about people. She had on a white apron, a blue long slaved shirt, black yoga pants, and brown flip flops.

"Don't change topics! Honestly I thought you were a big girl." Lola's mother complains.

"But mom there wasn't a bathroom here, what am I suppose to do." Lola asks.

"Don't lie to me, there was a toilet back there." Lola's mom said, pointing to where Lola came from.

"But that was a baby toilet." Lola complains.

Her mom then delivered a hard smack her a wet bottom. "That's not a baby toilet, that's a big girl potty and you used one before and should have no shame about it." She tells her daughter. "In fact I better go get you into a baby toilet to teach you a lesson." She said as she drags Lola by the ear.

Lola was whining about the pain. "Ow ow, stop, ouch" she whines until she saw her mom open a door. "Hey where did this come from?" She asks as her mom drags her in.

After she left the hallway, a small explosion appears in front of the door and a young women is standing in front of it. She had on a black cloak and big witch hat, everything else about her was hidden,She was about 4 feet tall.

"Well this is fun, my illusions are working well. Her mind will soon lose sense of reailty and then all she'll remember is being just how I want her to be." She said and then went into an evil laugh.

When Lola was dragged into the door her mom let go of her ear and she saw she was in...
12123.title: Mother of wet accidents and the Witch of Illusion

1213.content:
"What kind of place is place?" asked Lola. "Hello is anyone there?" asked Lola. She wanted to complete the labyrinth. The mysterious prize peeked her curiosity. She hoped it would be something like a billion dollars or a brand new car. She would settle for becoming a model, though that is low as she would go. She spotted the three paths she could take. "I think I am will go with the normal way. Straight as the crow flies." said Lola.

Lola decided to take the straight path.

Lola started to walk down the straight path. She thought about all of the wonderful things she could win if she solved the labyrinth. She soon ran into a wall. She looked around and spotted a set of three doors. She wanted to make the right choice.

The First door was green with a few cartoon in diapers painted on it.

The Second door was yellow with several toys painted on the door.

The third door was pink with pacifiers painted on it.
1213.title: The Three Doors

1221.content:
Whitney decided to head left. She made her way down the left path. Whitney started to thick about what she would use her money for. She could always use the money to pay off her student loans and maybe get a new car for school.

After what felt like twenty minutes of walking. Whitney had to pee badly. Whitney soon spotted a training potty in her size. She looked and saw a stack of pull up and diapers in her size. Not thinking she would make it any further without peeing herself she decided to......
1221.title: Left

12213.content:
Whitney looked at the diaper and figured what the hell. She removed her shorts and panties. She looked at the diapers. She saw the cute designs on the diaper. Whitney went to work putting on the diaper. She made quick work diapering herself. Whitney looked at her diapered butt. It did not take long for the flood gates to release. Whitney felt the diaper swell up with her pee. She was amazed on how little control she had over it.

After she was done, she removed the soaked diaper and decided to put on another one. She tried to put her pants back over the diaper but it would not fit. She looked around and decided to walk with out pants. Whitney soon came across a set of wardrobes. Each one at as a door through the maze. Above the door said Pick one and put it on to continue through the maze

Which wardrobe does she choose.
Left Wardrobe has a frilly pink shirt and skirt
Middle Wardrobe has small sundress
Right Wardrobe has a cute red onise

122132.content: Whitney decided she would pick the middle wardrobe. She removed her top and put the cute sun dress on. She watched as the wardrobe disappear and path was open up for her. Whitney looked down to see her diaper was hidden barely under the dress. Whitney started to skip across the maze in a childish maze. Whitney was amazed on how comfortable in diapers. She soon came to a fork in the path. She sniffed the air and smelled food down the left path. Whitney's stomach growled as she was starving what does she do?
122132.title: Middle Path

122133.content:
Whitney decided she would pick the right wardrobe. She removed her top and put the onise on. Whitney looked at her diapered butt under the onise. 'Mommy I need a change." said Whitney to herself. Whitney started to laugh at herself. Whitney looked up to see a path opened up for her.

She went down the nearly pure dark path. Whitney suddenly fell down what felt like a large slide. Whitney slide down for a few minutes. Whitney laid on a pile of something soft. Whitney looked around to see she in what looked like a large daycare and she was in a pile of large stuff animals. She exited the pile of plushies. She saw everything was scaled to make it look like she was small child. Whitney went to a pinck table where cookies were on.

Whitney decided to eat a cookie as she was hungry. Suddenly...
122133.title: Right One

1221333.content: What else could have happen
1221333.title: Other

choices: A robot nanny enter the room
12213332.content:
Whitney soon finished the plate of wonderful cookies. She even drank the large cup of cold milk not thinking about why would there be fresh cookie and milk on a plastic table. Whitney was glad she found the cookies as she was starving. She looked around the large daycare room. She saw there was a few changing tables that were full stock in different diapers, cribs, a large bathroom with a tub. Whitney was amazed on how much stuff there was.

Whitney froze as she felt a cramp in her stomach. She tried to move but could not budge in the pain. Whitney whined as she felt her diaper expand as she filled it up with poop. She soon wet herself in the pain. Whitney went to her knees and started to cry.

12213333.content: What else could have happen Last choices

choices: The pull ups catch up with you ( you get put in pull ups)
1222.content:
Whitney looked around. "I hope the prize is worth all this hard work. I am not great with labyrinth. I could use a wonderful prize money." said Whitney. She thought about buying herself a new car for school. She never thought of anything for school. "I love the wall paper. Anyways. Which way do I want to go? I know Eeny, meeny, miny, moe, Catch a tiger by the toe. If he hollers, let him go, Eeny, meeny, miny, moe." said Whitney. She was pointing to the right path. "There we go. Onward, ho!" said Whitney.

Whitney started to walk down the path singing, 'How far we come.' Whitney started to prance around. She soon spotted a pile of pull-ups. She looked at them. They had a strange designs, https://assets.listia.com/photos/84efcbf... The pull-ups were big enough to fit her. She felt the pull-ups and figured they could be comfy. Suddenly the pull-ups started to fly in the air like a pack of bats or birds. "Okay that is not good."

Whitney took of running. She had a bad feeling about the pull ups.
1222.title: Right on track

choices: Head forward and risk being captured
Head Back and try a new path
1223.content:
Whitney looked around. "I guess the quickest way through it a straight line. Or may in a labyrinth, you never want to go straight. Oh well." said Whitney. She did not really care. She just wanted the prize. She wanted a few million dollars so she can get out of her credit card debt and get herself a new car, and a house with a pool. She was not the most reliable person. She is some times called a scatter brain.

Whitney walked along the path until she saw two pair of giant floating hands. Whitney gasped as she nearly wet herself out of fear. The hands were as big as she was. She wonder what the giant hands will do to her if she goes pass them.
1223.title: Straight forward

12231.content:
Whitney took a deep breath. She slowly started to walk forward. She slowly crept by the giant hands. She suddenly felt herself get picked up. "Ah.." screamed Whitney. "Let me go. Let me go." yelled Whitney. She struggled to free herself. She was pinned in the air by the hands. She froze when she more hands appeared. She continued to fight. "Let got of me, bitch." said Whitney. She wanted to be freed.
She looked at the new hands coming near her, holding ________________. "No. No way. Get that away from me. Get it away from me" said Whitney. She struggled
12231.title: Sneak Forward

122311.content:
As the hand holding the ridiculously thick diaper approach me two more hands ripped off my pants and panties, while a third hand came covered in baby lotion and rubbed its self over my diaper region and effectively lubricating it. And just as the hand holding the now diaper unfolded up diaper floated there holding it's position beneath me as it waited as a fourth hand holding a big boodle of baby power came and coated the inside of the diaper in baby powered and then came up to me and powered my diaper region galore. Imminently after the fourth hand withdrew the hand the diaper came up between my legs and held the diaper against my women hood and with two if its fingers holding both sides of the diaper up to my skin. While two more hands came and taped the diaper shut nice and snug.

"I can't believe you just diapered me! I don't even need them and I'm a collage student so I'm way to old for them!" I screamed

Now with the diaper on another hand came with 2 boodles filled with milk that looked more like syringes. "NO no I wont dr hmm." I was cut off when one of the boodles nibbles were forced into my mouth which imminently inflated so I couldn't spit it out. As another hand pushed on the opposite side forcing the milk into my mouth and with no other option I drank the milk as it filled my mouth till both boodles were finished and removed from my mouth. Finally when everything was said and done the hand holding me set me down on my ridiculously thick diapered butt, and was nudging me to go forward to fork in the road.

I looked back and saw the hand waving me good bye as it flew away and disappeared. "All thank god that's all over, now lets see if I can't get this dumb thing off me." I said as I found I could not make the tapes budge not even a little and I couldn't even slide the diaper down, it was way to tight of a fit to do that. Granted I got a good look at the outside of my diaper it had a white background with a green heart with with some purple text on it that said not activated and below it said 1 of 6 "All that's just great I'm stuck in this thing till I can fine someone to help take it off. Also what's does this text mean? Wait 1 of 6 does that mean they're more of these things?! Whatever I guess I need to move forward now which way will I go Left or Right?"

The Left path I heard the clonking of gears and the path to my Right I heard the soft hmm of nursery rimes
122311.title: a Diaper

choices: Risk throwing the ball at the moving toilet button
Press the diaper button in hand
1223111.content:
I went left towards the sounds of the sound of gears clunking away and came upon a room filled with mechanical machines all doing different task. Like one was weaving together baby clothes while another one filled bottles and another one was making diapers.

"Ah so this must be the heart of this whole maze where everything is made and from what I can tell this place it going to make me into a baby! Err do they really have to humiliate us just so we can earn our prize? Anyways how do I move forward I don't see a door?" I said and out of nowhere a mechanical arm came from behind and latch itself to my waist as it begins to lift me.

"What the heck is this let me go." I said as then the arm stopped right over a shoot that feed into this a machine with eight mechanical arms that sprang to life in the shoot, but the arms couldn't reach me at all and began to madly try to reach and grab me as another hand came down from the ceiling giving me a boll.

“Huh a ball? What am I supposed to do with this?” I said as I felt the need to pee really badly as a squirt escaped into my diaper before I noticed.

“What the heck. A squirt got out?! Well in any case at least I was wearing a diaper. But I need to get out of here and fast think there has to be a way out.” I said while looking around when a button popped up on a nearby gear and was spinning around fairly rapidly.

“Ah there’s a button over there that must be my way out. But that’s going to be hard to hit.” I said as I got ready to throw my ball but then suddenly the ball split into two in my hand and I almost dropped half of it.

“Ug now what?” As I looked at the two halves at one with another button on it and the other with text that said “You have two choice each with their own consequences 1. Toilet 2. Diaper choose wisely” I then looked at the buttons again and noticed the one on the other half of the slit ball had a picture of diaper which would mean the other one is a picture of a toilet.

“This is just great which one do I shoot for? Ehh I really need to go.”

She started to walk away from the training potty. Sally walked down the path. Every few moments, Sally would stop and fell a sharp pain on her bladder. Sally came upon a large pile of pull ups. Sally walked over to the pile of pull ups. The pull ups were easily meant for adults, though they had childish print on them. http://24.media.tumblr.com/2d64173392cdf... She felt them. "Wow this are pretty thick." said Sally. She felt another painful spasm in her bladder.

choices: Put on a dry pull up
123211.content:
Sally signed as she really had no other option for herself. "Screw it." said Sally. Sally released a little pee in her panties. Sally decided to remove her pants. She then removed her panties. She three her panties down in a huff of angry. She grabbed a pair of pull ups. She slide the pull ups on her body. She pulled up the pull up just in time. She gasped as her bladder gave in. She started to pee into her pull ups. She looked down to see the stars of the pull-ups started to disappear. "What a relief." said Sally. Sally soon finished peeing. She felt her pull ups. The pull-ups were well soaked. She touched the pull-ups and felt the pull-ups.

Sally looked around. She could not have find her panties anywhere. "Where did they go?" asked Sally. She searched the area for her panties. She found her pants but not her panties. Sally shifted as she felt the warmth of the pull-ups. "I can not believe I am still wearing this soaked pull-ups." said Sally. She looked at the pile of pull-ups.

choices: She makes it to the potty but...
She doesn't get there in time
123213.content:
Sally looks at the pull ups and the direction she came from, where the training potty was. "I rather use something considered a toilet, then something close to a diaper!" Sally said, as she ran back to the potty. She kept feeling pain in her lags, but she thought she could hold it until she got to that little toilet. "Ok, if I remember right, I should be seeing it in a few seconds." She tells herself.

What happens?
123213.title: Try to make it back the training potty.

choices: Give in and follow the leash
1233.content:
"I hope this prize is great." said Sally. She looked at the three paths. "Well I can not go back. So let go straight." said Sally outloud. She pointed forward before she started to walk. "I don't think I am in a normal labyrinth. "Whoever is out there? You are messing with a cop here. I have the power to arrest you." said Sally. She reached for her gun and felt a pacifier instead. Her gun was replaced was a pacifier and her handcuffs were replaced with a rattle. Sally threw them to the ground.

Sally spotted a giant flying http://blogs.babycenter.com/wp-content/u... "What the fresh hell is this." said Sally. The monkey leash seemed to be alive. THe leash seemed to notice Sally Mayweather. "No, Go away." said Sally. She started to run away for the leash but it seemed to be faster than her. The monkey leash tackled her to the ground.

After a few minutes of wrestling the monkey was attached to Sally and no matter how hard she tried she could not get the leash off her. She felt the leash started to pull on her. "Great I am getting pulled by a monkey leash." said Sally. She looked to see the leash was stretched out.
1233.title: Stupid Monkey Leash

info.brief_description: You decided to try this fun new maze, but it does not turn out like you thought.
info.description:
Welcome to the Labyrinth of New Beginnings. You enter an seeming endless magical labyrinth, were the walls of the labyrinth touch the giant ceiling. The walls of the labyrinth was covered in childish wallpaper. In this magical labyrinth is filled with flying hands, giants, and other magical objects and creatures. In the labyrinth, you end of being diapered and other babyish things.

Rules-

1. No shrinking or growing

2. No expanding or fating

3. Keep Pg-16

4. No Death or Gore

5. No turning into inanimate object or any object.

6. Have fun

7. Try to write at least a paragraph
